description: Circular imports between two files are not allowed.

entries.reason: TODO: Add reason why this violation is allowed to be ignored.
entries.error: 'src/app/challenge/[id]/solutions/_components/index.tsx' and 'src/app/challenge/[id]/solutions/_components/solution-editor.tsx' have a circular import. Please decouple the dependencies, such as creating a new file, to remove the circular import. Cycle: src/app/challenge/[id]/solutions/_components/solution-editor.tsx src/app/challenge/[id]/solutions/page.tsx src/app/challenge/[id]/solutions/_components/index.tsx
